Armada



Armada: Airbomber? How can I be sure that's you?


(Armada awaits=
 an answer.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
  Subject: =
Re: Big Post(with fries)


  Arrow puts Airbomber on.

  Airbomber: Infectr=
a? Is that you really?...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orch=
id* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 =
AM
    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Armada



    Armada: Airbom=
ber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


    (Armada sa=
ys back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries=
)


      Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

      Airb=
omber: You can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to =
pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

      Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to =
you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
    From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunda=
y, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
        Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


     =
   Armada



        (Armada listens to the voice coming over her commlink.=
)


        Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada=
 now. Who is this?


        (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an a=
nswer from Arrow.)

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From:=
 Soulstice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sat=
urday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
          Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)
=


          Airbomber: But where do we go?

          Arrow: That's up to y=
ou, Airbomber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

          Train Wreck: Actually,=
 he WOULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

          S=
tranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

          Airbomber: But how c=
an that be?

          Arrow: Call her.

          Airbomber: I tried that.=


          Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call =
her.

          Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

          Arrow: Is there =
anyone named Infectra there?...

            ----- Original Message ----- 
=
            From: Alloran2@... 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

            Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
            Subject: Bi=
g Post(with fries)


            OOC: Please add the new Destron base to th=
e events page, Zardus.  Its in 
            Syria. 

            :::Ramjet/=
Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

            Ramjet: The one extremely close=
 to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
            by a bot named P=
rebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
            and=
 Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
 =
           of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i thi=
nk we might 
            be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
      =
      ~~~~~ 
            Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Tha=
nks for the idea Zardus!) 
            ~~~~~ 
            Vulois: Yes, lets=
. I think we should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
            be=
 the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
      =
      Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
            ::he walks out of hi=
s cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
            ~~~~~ 
            ::Time=
 Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
      =
      said about Infectra:: 
            Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Allia=
nce?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
            definately wasnt All=
iance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
            guys ar=
e fools.

erms of Service.
